thread.section_title: Articulate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Articulate | articulate.com
thread.title: Diane Peters

author: Diane Peters
title: Diane Peters
text:
I LOVE the flexibility Storyline 2 offers for designing and developing eLearning. The more I learn about variables and triggers, the more things I'm able to make my eLearnings do...and I know NOTHING about Flash or Java programming!
The Articulate Community is the BEST!!! I can always find answers to my questions...someone has had the question before me and has posted a solution. On the rare occasion that there is no answer and I post a question, many "heroes" weigh in with answers. I'm constantly amazed by the ingenuity of this community :-)
